info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 4:50PM EDT until August 04 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Saratoga County in east central New York... Southwestern Washington County in east central New York... North central Rensselaer County in east central New York... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 449 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mechanicville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Saratoga Springs, Mechanicville, Greenwich, Round Lake, Country Knolls, Gates, Malta, Lee, Easton, Stillwater, Schuylerville, Victory, Schaghticoke, Valley Falls, Deans Corners, Center Falls, Grangerville, Johnsonville, Willow Glen and Coons. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
